mapper.select: select customer_Name from Customer where customer_Index = #{customer_Index}
mapper.insert: insert into Customer (customer_Id, customer_Password, customer_Name, customer_ResidentNumber, customer_PhoneNumber, customer_Address, customer_Email, customer_Image) values( #{customer_Id}, #{customer_Password}, #{customer_Name}, #{customer_ResidentNumber}, #{customer_PhoneNumber}, #{customer_Address}, #{customer_Email}, #{customer_Image} )
mapper.delete: delete from Customer where customer_Id = #{ customer_Id }
mapper.update: update Customer set customer_Password = #{customer_Password}, customer_PhoneNumber = #{customer_PhoneNumber}, customer_Email = #{customer_Email}, customer_Address = #{customer_Address} where customer_Id = #{customer_Id} and customer_Name = #{customer_Name}
